data.message: hi, i've been trying since the 3rd of august to change my profile picture but the box to crop the photo just will not drag or expand, i'm stuck with an old photo that i was only able to change cause it had been previously cropped, i'm getting annoyed att not being able to display newly uploaded pics of myself as my profile, it's getting increasingly frustrating, is there anything you could do or suggest pleas, and could you inbox me and ways to resolve this please :)
